title: Supreme Court seeks response from Adani Power over Rajasthan discoms appeal on 'change in law' benefits
description: The Supreme Court has sought a response from Adani Power regarding an appeal by Rajasthan discoms against a tribunal's order to pay Rs 186 crore due to 'change in law' benefits. The discoms claim they have already paid Rs 124 crore and argue that the tribunal erroneously favored Adani Power.
